You can use a readied action to counterspell any spell being cast on you or an adjacent ally that requires a ranged touch attack (such as a ray). In order to successfully counter the spell, you must make an unarmed attack roll. If the result of this attack roll is higher than 20 + the spellâ€™s caster level, the spell is negated with no effect.

At 17th level, any spell you successfully negate is reflected back at the caster with the same ranged touch attack result.

You must be at least 11th level before selecting this revelation.
